lines.text: [about a mad scientist who developed rapidly growing vines to take over the galaxy]
He used to be such a nice fellow at Universe University. I guess he took the Ivy League too seriously.
Probably risking his fool neck, as usual.
Now now, Venus, none of your feminine intution. Let's stick to the facts.

[Lines spoken by Steve and Venus in the opening sequence of every episode, prior to their boarding Fireball XL-5]
Okay, Venus?

[slang used by multiple characters in various episodes]
Tooty!

[slang used by multiple characters in various episodes]
It's Real Boss!
